section.title: Include Design Studio model
section.p:
The include widget represents the inclusion of a model within a model. For example, a fragment can be included in a module and a module can be included in a page. If the included file cannot be found, an
is displayed in place of the included file otherwise, the contents of the included file are displayed.

section.title: Include XSP from outside Design Studio
section.p: You can include a handwritten XSP module (as opposed to Design Studio generated XSP) in a page model.
